Title: Snow plowing in a new residential area, Tankomäenkatu
Message:

Other cars are queuing because they can't get any other route progressing. What about people who don't have a car? They are in trouble, especially older people, young students and parents of infants. Greetings to Anni Sinnemäki, who praises this urban construction.

Title: Tankomäenkatu (00950)
Message:
Hey,

My feedback applies to the maintenance of Tankomäenkatu (00950) in Mellunkylä.

The sidewalk today on the feedback day Sat 16.1.2021 continues to plow (unpaved spots are very difficult and impossible to travel with, for example, strollers or rollator).
Also a street roadway, hardened snow. The snow plowed is also piled on the sidewalk side to make it even more difficult to go there.

This Tankomäenkatu is influenced by the real Nomansland of the area.
As early as 2019, I have given feedback that the street should provide a similar permanent car transfer request (forbidden parking on a certain day of the week x times a month) as on similar residential streets (eg Puotila side). There is still no transfer call.
Both spring 2019 and 2020, the spring washing was not done, both times I made both written feedback, and I called the people responsible for the area for weeks.
The spring 2019 cleaning was finally done in the first week of June (about 2 months later in other streets in the area), in the spring of 2020 in early May (well over 1 month later than other streets in the area).

The problems of Tankomäenkatu are its incomplete, narrowness and parking on both sides of the street (there is no ban on this, so cars are even left directly in front of our house entrance to the street).
The sidewalks on the side of the even numbers are still waiting for the sidewalk, which was promised to start as early as August-September 2020 (Tankomäenkatu 6 and 8 housing manager Joona Eskola asked the city in late summer). All of the homes on the even numbers have been completed by May 2020.

On behalf of our own housing company and other users of that street, I look forward to the following activities from the area's maintenance:
- Winter maintenance will be improved immediately
- A permanent car transfer call for maintenance is ordered on the street to facilitate maintenance
- Spring cleaning will be handled this spring on time without having to complain several times
- Street construction will start in the spring as soon as the weather permitted

Regards,

Thanks for your message, and my apologies for e.g. There has been room for improvement in the quality of winter maintenance. Hopefully the situation in the area is already slightly relieved. We have had to prioritize the plowing trails after an exceptionally high snow, and only one half of the sidewalk has had to be plowed in some places. All possible plowing equipment is in use and we strive to balance the situation as soon as possible.
